mapper.sql: select rnum, product_id, product_name, price, product_img, product_img_stored
select rnum, p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, p.product_img, product_img_stored
mapper.select:
from ( select p.*, row_number()
over(order by price)
over(order by price desc)
over(order by product_name)
as rnum, c.category_name, c.detail_category_name from product p, category c where p.category_no=c.category_no and REPLACE(p.product_name, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) p
select count(*) from product where REPLACE(product_name, ' ', '') like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select p.*, s.seller_id, s.seller_email, s.brand, s.seller_tel, c.* from product p, seller s, category c where p.seller_id = s.seller_id and p.category_no = c.category_no and s.brand = #{brand}
order by price
order by price desc
order by product_name
select distinct c.category_name, s.brand from product p, seller s, category c where p.seller_id = s.seller_id and p.category_no = c.category_no and s.brand = #{brand} order by c.category_name desc

select s.brand, p.*, c.* from product p, seller s, category c where p.seller_id = s.seller_id and p.category_no = c.category_no and s.brand = #{brand} and c.category_name = #{category}
order by price
order by price desc
order by product_name
select stock from product where product_id = #{value}
mapper.update: update product set stock = stock - #{productCount} where product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: select p.* from product p, (select category_no, category_name from category where category_name=#{value}) c where p.category_no = c.category_no
mapper.insert: insert into product(product_id, product_name, price, product_info, stock, product_img, product_img_stored, seller_id, category_no) values(product_seq.nextval, #{productName}, #{price}, #{productInfo}, #{stock}, #{productImg}, #{productImgStored}, #{sellerVO.sellerId}, #{categoryVO.categoryNo})
mapper.select: select p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, p.product_info, p.stock, c.category_no, c.category_name, c.detail_category_name from product p, category c where p.seller_id = #{sellerVO.sellerId} and p.category_no = c.category_no order by p.product_id desc
